entry.title: Russia Announces Annexation of Four Regions of Ukraine
entry.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin announced plans to formally annex swaths of Ukrainian territory into the Russian Federation, signaling a sharp escalation in the war as Kyiv vowed to retake occupied areas.

entry.title: Ukrainian Forces Move to Surround Russian Troops in Key City as Putin Lays Claim to Regions
entry.content: Russian soldiers around the eastern city of Lyman faced defeat, even as their president announced he was annexing the territory they were losing.
